title: Implement Delete Tasks and Subtasks Tools
description: Add new tools to the Windsurf Task Master: 1) A delete task tool for removing tasks and reorganizing task IDs, and 2) A subtask system for managing complex tasks with multiple subtasks.

title: Implement Automatic Task Cleanup Service
description: Create an intelligent Task Cleanup Service that automatically maintains task quality and organization. The service should use hooks to trigger after task completion, use Windsurf LLM for similarity detection, and handle metadata consistency, task ID reorganization, orphaned subtasks, and task quality enforcement.

title: Implement and Debug Get Projects Tool
description: Create a new get_projects tool to replace the old list-project-ids tool. Implement the necessary TaskManager method and ensure proper MCP integration.
